00054     class RTT_API TypeInfoRepository
00055     {
00056         TypeInfoRepository();
00057         typedef std::map<std::string, TypeInfo*> map_t;
00058         map_t data;
00059 
00060         typedef std::vector<TransportPlugin*> Transports;
00061         Transports transports;
00062     public:
00063         ~TypeInfoRepository();

00065         static shared_ptr Instance();
00071         TypeInfo* type( const std::string& name ) const;
00072 
00080         bool addType( TypeInfo* ti);
00081 
00092         bool aliasType( const std::string& alias, TypeInfo* source = 0 );
00093

00100

00106

00112

00117 
00121         TypeInfo* getTypeById(const char * type_id_name) const;
00122 
00126         template<class T>
00127         TypeInfo* getTypeInfo() const {
00128             return getTypeById( &typeid(T) );
00129         }
